meals.name: Berry Nut Yogurt Parfait
meals.description: A simple, protein-rich breakfast parfait filled with nutritious berries and crunchy nuts, perfect for supporting your weight loss journey.
instructions: 1. In a bowl, mix the Greek yogurt and vanilla extract until smooth.
2. Layer half of the yogurt into a glass or bowl.
3. Add a layer of mixed berries over the yogurt.
4. Add a tablespoon of chopped almonds over the berries.
5. Repeat with the remaining yogurt, berries, and almonds.
6. Drizzle honey over the top before serving.

meals.name: Beef and Veggie Stir Fry
meals.description: This delicious beef and veggie stir fry is a high-protein, balanced meal perfect for weight loss, full of nutrients and flavor.
instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
2. Add garlic and sautÃ© for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
3. Add beef slices and cook until browned, about 2-3 minutes.
4. Remove beef from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot. Stir-fry for about 5 minutes until the veggies are crispy-tender.
6. Return beef to the skillet and pour in the soy sauce.
7. Stir well to combine all ingredients and heat through.
8. Sprinkle with chopped green onions before serving.

meals.name: Garlic Herb Grilled Steak with Spinach
meals.description: A flavorful and protein-rich dinner that's great for weight loss, featuring deliciously seasoned grilled steak and fresh spinach.
instructions: 1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
2. In a small bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, thyme, salt, and pepper.
3. Rub the mixture all over the steak.
4. Grill the steak for 4-5 minutes on each side or until desired doneness.
5. Remove steak from grill and let it rest for a couple of minutes.
6. Meanwhile, lightly sautÃ© the spinach in a pan until just wilted.
7. Serve the grilled steak with the sautÃ©ed spinach on the side.

snacks.name: Cottage Cheese with Sliced Peaches
snacks.description: A creamy and protein-packed snack with the natural sweetness of peaches, offering a satisfying and nutritious option to support weight loss.
instructions: 1. Place cottage cheese in a bowl.
2. Top with sliced peach.
3. Sprinkle chia seeds on top and serve.

snacks.name: Hummus and Veggie Sticks
snacks.description: A quick, fiber-rich snack featuring creamy hummus paired with crisp, fresh veggie sticks, perfect for healthy weight management.
instructions: 1. Arrange carrot and celery sticks on a plate.
2. Add hummus alongside the veggies.
3. Dip veggie sticks in hummus and enjoy.
